bridge-type.label: OpenWebNet USB Dongle
bridge-type.description:
This gateway (BTicino/Legrand models: BTI-3578/088328) connects via USB to a BTicino/Legrand ZigBee network using the OpenWebNet protocol.
For more information see:
  • http://www.catalogue.bticino.com/BTI-3578-EN
  • http://ecatalogue.legrand.fr/088328-interface-open-radio-permet-piloter-installation.html
